question.text:
Find the incorrect statement from the following.

A. Tropical rain forests cover around 6% of the earth's land surface.
B. The Amazonian rain forest is being cut and cleared for soya bean cultivation or for conversion to grasslands for raising beef cattle.
C. Animals with migratory habits are badly affected by habitat loss and fragmentation.
D. Mammals and birds require small territories.

options.text: <math><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi></math>
<math><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi></math>

solution.text: When large habitats are broken up into small fragments due to various human activities, mammals and birds requiring large territories and certain animals with migratory habits are badly affected, leading to population decline.
